title: Game Scoop Episode 515
description: The best publishers, Sony's first-party studios, Wargroove, and more. The song at the end of this episode is Daemon's cover of "Everyday" by AFX. You can find it on his Daecare album.
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (IGN)
